resources.string: Adapted from: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Distributed by: Warner Bros., Warner Bros. Pictures, FilmFlex
Based on: Deadpool; by: Fabian Nicieza; Rob Liefeld
Ajax, a twisted scientist, experiments on Wade Wilson, a mercenary, to cure him of cancer and give him healing powers. However, the experiment leaves Wade disfigured and he decides to exact revenge.

Harry Potter and Dumbledore\'s warning about the return of Lord Voldemort is not heeded by the wizard authorities who, in turn, look to undermine Dumbledore\'s authority at Hogwarts and discredit Harry.
